project_abstract.cdata: Project components include: (a) provision of fishing materials and equipment to fishermen; (b) development and expansion of fishing centers and stations; (c) improvement of fish marketing; (d) strengthening of fisheries extension services and training for fishermen; (e) construction and equipping of headquarters facilities for the RDS; (f) studies and pilot development activities for the Lake Tanganyika coastal region; (g) technical assistance, including training, studies and preparation of future projects.
